title: Disseminated nontuberculous mycobacterial infection mimicking lymphoma in an adult without diagnosed immunodeficiency: A case report
content:
Publication date: 30 October 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 20

Author(s): Soo Hyun Park, Jin Woong Suh, Jeong Yeon Kim, Yeseul Kim, Sun Bean Kim, Jang Wook Sohn, Young Kyung Yoon
